description: This file defines the WPEFramework::Exchange::IGuide interface, which provides methods for interacting with guide content such as channels, programs, and parental controls, as well as notifications related to guide events.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: An interface for accessing and controlling guide-related functionalities such as retrieving channel and program info, managing parental controls, and registering notifications.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: An interface for receiving notifications about guide events like EIT broadcast, emergency alerts, and changes in parental control status.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the parser with a given shell context.

methods.name: GetChannels
methods.description: Retrieves a string representing all available channels.

methods.name: GetPrograms
methods.description: Retrieves a string representing all programs.

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Retrieves information about the current program for a given parameter.

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available audio languages for a given index.

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available subtitle languages for a given index.

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is active.

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Locks or unlocks parental control with a reason.

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if parental lock is active for a specific context.

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
